attributes.action: urgently review the decision of North Somerset Council to move 700 staff to Clevedon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
North Somerset Council has agreed to buy an office block in Clevedon for £15 million. 

It intends to close and sell other offices around Weston-super-Mare and move hundreds of jobs to the new Clevedon building.

This will cost Weston hundreds of desperately needed jobs, cost the taxpayer a fortune for years to come in loan repayments and harm the regeneration of Weston-super-Mare.

We urge the Prime Minister and Government to urgently call in this decision and request that North Somerset Council think again.
